data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Maharajganj to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 2,655,168 people in Maharajganj who are far from you. Please add 536 new house churches this year.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Maharajganj to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Rajput Agnivansi people.
Father, help your children in Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 29,532 believers in Maharajganj, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 2,684,700.

We estimate Maharajganj has 29,532 people who might know Jesus, 32,574 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,622,594 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Maharajganj, Uttar Pradesh, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
